author: terencechain

author: terencechain
content: Hi <@592004585506340885> when is the next release? Sorry for the dependency Will need https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/pull/4258 to be in a relase for prysm to cut our v6 because of some unit test setup requires us to check against the upstream config value

author: jtraglia
content: Hey there. I was thinking about doing another beta release soon. Would early next week be okay?

author: jtraglia
content: When are you planning on cutting your v6 release? We can accommodate.

author: jtraglia
content: So you need a cl-specs release before then?

author: prestonvanloon
content: fwiw - if it's merged to the mainline branch then we can pick a commit rather than release but it's undesired

author: prestonvanloon
content: want rather need, releases are due in 11 days and release cycle takes 3 to 5 days so we were hoping to get out early. waiting til next week loses 4 of the 11 days
